sourceMeaningMnemonic: Aside from <radical>gold</radical> there are a <radical>wide</radical> variety of other <kanji>mineral</kanji>s as well.
meaningInfo: Think of the wide range of minerals there are that aren't gold. There are a lot.
readingMnemonic: One person is trying to control all the <kanji>minerals</kanji> of the world. That person is Emperor <ja><reading>こう</reading>いち</ja>.
readingInfo: Emperor <ja>こういち</ja> is getting all the minerals, and the <ja>鋼</ja>, so he can take over all neighboring nations and force them into a subjugation of efficient kanji learning.
